ball.util.ant.taskdefs.compilers

Class SystemJavaCompilerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ball.util.ant.taskdefs.compilers.SystemJavaCompilerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompilerAdapter, CompilerAdapterExtension
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LintAdapter

    public class SystemJavaCompilerAdapter
extends Object
implements CompilerAdapter, CompilerAdapterExtension
    CompilerAdapter implementation for the system JavaCompiler. Subclass implementors will likely only need to override compile(StandardJavaFileManager,DiagnosticMap).
    Version:
    $Revision: 5855 $
    Author:
    Allen D. Ball
    See Also:
    ToolProvider.getSystemJavaCompiler()

      • compile

        protected boolean compile(StandardJavaFileManager fm,
                          DiagnosticMap map)
                   throws Throwable
        Method to do the compilation work. Subclass implementations should override this method by first chaining back to the superclass implementation.

        The StandardJavaFileManager parameter will have its StandardLocation.PLATFORM_CLASS_PATH set to Javac.getBootclasspath(), StandardLocation.CLASS_PATH set to Javac.getClasspath(), StandardLocation.CLASS_OUTPUT set to Javac.getDestdir(), and StandardLocation.SOURCE_PATH set to Javac.getSrcdir().

        Parameters:
        fm - The StandardJavaFileManager.
        map - The DiagnosticMap.
        Returns:
        true if the compilation was successful; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        Throwable - If any problems are encountered in the compilation.

      • asFileList

        protected List<? extends File> asFileList(Path path)
        Method to convert the argument Path to a File List.
        Parameters:
        path - The Path.
        Returns:
        The Path as a File List or null if the argument Path is null.
